fields.description:
{html}

A premium customer submitted a ticket that when they set a sliders value to 0 the slider became unusable. I have reproduced this as well. Code below.

var basicSlider = Titanium.UI.createSlider({

min:0,
max:10,
value:0,
width:100,
height:'auto',
top:30

});

Helpdesk ticket:
http://helpdesk.appcelerator.net/tickets/3061

{html}
fields.summary: Slider breaks when value is set to 0
